name: Rundead
description: Dr. Horace wanted to cure baldness. Instead he created zombies. Now he's trapped in an underground lab with fabulously haired zombies, backstabbing co-workers and no weapons. Can you help him identify friend from foe, cure the undead, and escape a labyrinth of out-of-control lab experiments? Solve challenging puzzles across 14 story-driven levels to find out!
